text: "Kentucky Rain" is a 1970 song by Elvis Presley as a non-album single. It went to number 6 in Canada, number 7 in Australia, number 10 in Canada, number 14 in Ireland, number 16 in the United States and number 21 in the United Kingdom. Category:1970 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Country rock songs Category:Elvis Presley songs
title: Kentucky Rain
